Manuel just quit his job so he could start his own business mowing yards and plowing driveways.  He earned $\$10{,}000$ per year in his old job. Manuel wants to exceed the earnings from his old job by at least $\$5000$ per year. He will earn $\$25$ per hour spent mowing and $\$50$ per hour spent plowing.

**Write an *inequality* that represents the number of hours Manuel must spend mowing $(M)$ and plowing $(P)$ to achieve his yearly earnings goal.**
